name: Jihosoft Samsung Galaxy Recovery
short_description:
Jihosoft Samsung Galaxy Recovery is a simple and powerful recovery software that helps you scan and recover deleted or lost contacts, text messages, call history, photos, videos, audios, and other documents from Samsung Galaxy S3/S4/S5/Note 2/Note 3 and any other Samsung devices in just matter of time. 

Key Features of Jihosoft Samsung Galaxy Data Recovery 
- Recover deleted data from Samsung Galaxy, including contacts, text messages, call logs, photos, videos, audios, documents, etc. 
- Perform quick and effective data recovery Samsung Galaxy internal storage as well as external memory card. 
- Retrieve Samsung Galaxy data lost due to accidental deletion, factory settings restore, flashing ROM, rooting, etc. 
- Allow users to preview all the recoverable files in details and selectively recover what you want.
summary: Recover Data from Samsung Galaxy S3/S4/S5/Note 2/Note 3
